text:
We are using Tomcat 5.5.0 with JBoss 4.0.2 and occasionally we get the following StackOverflow exceptions. This will continue until we restart the server. During this time, the web server cannot be accessed by the users.
The JBoss is running under JDK 1.6.
Operating System: SunOS 5.10

2009-01-12 11:01:53,029 ERROR [org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.[jboss.web].[localhost].[/firmament].[action]] (http-0.0.0.0-8443-6:) Servlet.service() for servlet action threw exception

creator: kambiz.katani@lombardrisk.com
markt@apache.org
text: You have forwarded the request too many times for the stack size you have available. This is an application issue, or possibly a struts issue, not a Tomcat one. Alternatively, if you really need all those forwards, you need a bigger stack.
